card.name: CW - Cannot create users - Attorney front end

data.text:
@gillianoberholzer 

The urgent issue is sorted - you decide.
Who adds all the users in  Attorney CW as i remember that the SW Admin side should be used to create all the users cos the 2 systems were jippo'd to work hand in hand. 

This is not the first time we get a log with that screenshot. Can you please search for the other issues like this and see what the outcome or solution was. Then we know if its a new issue or if its one of the previous issue put on hold until the new version is complete.
